meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a ketone.
meanings.sent1: The ketonic smell of the nail polish remover filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Her experiment showed the ketonic nature of the compound she synthesized.
meanings.sent3: The ketonic cupcakes she baked had a unique aroma.
meanings.sent4: His ketonic personality shone through in his decisive actions.
meanings.sent5: The ketonic color of the liquid indicated the presence of a ketone.

meanings.sent1: The ketonic compound reacted with the reagent to form a new product.
meanings.sent2: The ketonic structure of the molecule was crucial for its reactivity.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her ketonic necklace was the secret to her energy.
meanings.sent4: The ketonic bond held the atoms together with strength.
meanings.sent5: The ketonic group in the molecule was highlighted in the diagram.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of a ketone.
meanings.sent1: The ketonic substance evaporated quickly due to its nature.
meanings.sent2: The ketonic compound exhibited similar behavior to other ketones.
meanings.sent3: The ketonic effect on the solution surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her ketonic reaction to stress was to remain calm and focused.
meanings.sent5: The ketonic properties of the solvent made it ideal for the reaction.
